description: [WARPWIRE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1116) can send captured credentials to C2 via HTTP `GET` or `POST` requests.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)
